Detailed Description

DO NOT INSTANTIATE use object mdp instead.

Example: 

/// int main(int argc, char**argv) {
///    mdp.open_wormholes(argc,argv);
///    // your code here
///    mdp << 3.14 << endl;  // only process 0 prints
///    mdp.close_wormholes();
///    return 0;
/// }
///
